Name: Sirian Lancers
Details: The Sirian Lancers are the provincial forces of the Free Worlds League's Sirian Concordance. Angry at the Captain-General and the LCCC for not liberating their homeworlds of Sirius and Procyon sooner, the Lancers all but gone their own way. The Lancers consist of three regiments of BattleMechs with supporting conventional formations.
